title: Can the traffic light at Brunswick forest and the light for north 17 traffic to turn south just outside BF be adjusted. Either the timing is off or the triggers do not operate properly. Many times cars will turn left because the light takes too long to change.
text:
This is a question you'll have to direct to the NCDOT. Last time we
spoke with them, there were no plans in this area for re-alignment of
traffic signal.
